description: Promoting of Appliance Energy Efficiency and Transformation of the Refrigerating Appliance Market in Ghana

subproject.description: To improve the energy efficiency of appliances manufactured, marketed and used in Ghana through the introduction of a combination of regulatory tool such as Minimum Energy Performance Standards and Information Labels (S&L) and innovative economic tools.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Promoting of Appliance Energy

title: Promoting of Appliance Energy Efficiency
